OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD ASSOCIATION FOR SPINA BIFIDA AND HYDROCEPHALUS

Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides advice, support, grants and social events for the relief of people who have spina bifida, hydrocephalus or allied or related disorders. Provides care, welfare, treatment and education and supports integration into society for those affected by these conditions in Sheffield. Holds summer fun day and winter disco. Self or any referral.
